pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Grape Seed Oil Elixir 80ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Extra Care GRAPE SEED OIL ELIXIR is a lightweight oil for normal to dry hair for reduced frizziness & fly-aways.

EXTRA CARE GRAPE SEED OIL ELIXIR offers:
+ LIGHTWEIGHT NOURISHMENT
+ REDUCED FRIZZINESS AND FLY AWAYS
+ SUPPLENESS AND SILKY FINISH

Made in Australia
100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Suitable For: Normal To Dry Hair

Size: 80mL

Hair Type: Normal To Dry Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Reduced Frizziness & Fly-Aways
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Warnings

Keep bottle out of direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Cyclomethicone · Dimethicone · Parfum (Fragrance) · Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil · Trimethylsiloxysilicate

Directions

1. Use on towel-dried hair for PROTECTION, INDULGENT
NOURISHMENT and improved MANAGEABILITY
2. Use on dry hair for LONG LASTING MOISTURE
Apply 1-2 pumps onto the mid lengths and ends of the
hair. Leave In. Suitable for daily use.

USAGE ADVICE

- On the towel dried hair, for Protection, Indulgent Nourishment and improved Manageability.
- On dry hair, for Long-Lasting Moisture.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle is Kerbside Recyclable. Pump & Cap can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)
